content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAMâ€™s culture is diverse and as an increasing global team we not only come from 45+ countries across 4 different continents, but we share a common culture and interests, as well as a passion for results.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Individually, we are shaped by our history and our local experience, but collectively we are a global team.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To learn more about EPAM values, corporate culture, pillars and identity, please watch the video by Larry Solomon (our Chief People Officer).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=PJ6YDbRX\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":43854,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aed5dc29-ec32-44c6-9b76-f6c5ac2a95dd/values.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aed5dc29-ec32-44c6-9b76-f6c5ac2a95dd/values.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"values.png\",\"name\":\"values.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"aed5dc29-ec32-44c6-9b76-f6c5ac2a95dd\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":888,\"height\":665},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
